newsitem.title: JAPAN: Kobe rubber futures mixed in after-hours trade.
newsitem.headline: Kobe rubber futures mixed in after-hours trade.

text.p: Kobe rubber futures were narrowly mixed in after-hours trade on Tuesday as scattered bargain-hunting buying emerged after prices fell during the day in a technical correction, traders said.
Prices ranged from 0.4 yen per kg lower to 0.3 yen up from the day's close. Benchmark June was up 0.2 yen at 146.7 yen. Volume was 5,068 lots.
A perception that the yen's fall has stalled after comments by government officials expressing concern over its recent excessive decline also undermined market sentiment.
